0x2B9D4F50.name: GET_GAME_POOL

params.name: poolName
params.description: The pool name to get a list of entities from.

0x2B9D4F50.description:
Returns a list of entity handles (script GUID) for all entities in the specified pool - the data returned is an array as
follows:

```json
[ 770, 1026, 1282, 1538, 1794, 2050, 2306, 2562, 2818, 3074, 3330, 3586, 3842, 4098, 4354, 4610, ...]
```

### Supported pools

*   `CPed`: Peds (including animals) and players.
*   `CObject`: Objects (props), doors, and projectiles.
*   `CNetObject`: Networked objects
*   `CVehicle`: Vehicles.
*   `CPickup`: Pickups.

examples.code:
local vehiclePool = GetGamePool('CVehicle') -- Get the list of vehicles (entities) from the pool
for i = 1, #vehiclePool do -- loop through each vehicle (entity)
    if GetPedInVehicleSeat(vehiclePool[i], -1) == 0 then
        DeleteEntity(vehiclePool[i]) -- Delete vehicles (entities) that don't have a driver
    end
end

0x2B9D4F50.resultsDescription: An array containing entity handles for each entity in the named pool.
